channel.title: Is there a gif frame recorder?
channel.description:
instead of taking screenshots and opening them etc, is there a program that records a section of the screen and takes fast pics then combines them then you can save them?
I already tried google.

item.title: Is there a gif frame recorder?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I don’t think so. There is something you do, you take a short film, and turn it into a .gif file somehow. I use to have it on my old computer, but I haven’t seen it in ages.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a gif frame recorder?
